description:
Scope: Develop strategic (internal/external) sponsorship sales to generate/drive revenue for a leading destination venue. Will ensure guests have a memorable/social experience in addition to overseeing the implementation/fulfillment of sponsor agreements.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

• Secure multiyear/multimillion-dollar sponsorships

• Work w/ our client to identify sponsorship collateral/assets

• Directly contribute to revenue development and the overall growth of the business

• Craft partner packages/decks with new/innovative ideas that feature one-of-a-kind assets at our client to meet and exceed their partner marketing/business goals

• Proactively seek/cultivate business relationships

• Leverage knowledge/relationships w/ brands and sponsorship agencies

• Build trusted relationships/partnerships w/ sponsorship decision-makers

• Maintain pulse on the cultural landscape/trends (music, art, film, fashion, culinary);

YOU might be the RIGHT candidate if YOU have:

• BA degree in Business or Marketing

• Personal relationships with decision makers at top companies

• 10+ years in sponsorship sales/marketing experience (preferably with an entertainment venue or sports team)

• Strong knowledge of sponsorship sales, marketing and corporate community strategies including industry trends, key players, and terminology

• Well-versed and experienced in ad sales, prospecting, pursuing, and developing new sponsorship partnerships

• Passion for destination entertainment, retail, dining, and events

• Proficiency with Microsoft Office and easily adaptable to digital team/project management software and systems. InDesign a plus

Master Search Solutions is a direct hire recruiting firm that specializes in the New Jersey marketplace. We have over 25 years of experience connecting top talent with leading businesses. We are committed to (and celebrate) diversity, equity, and inclusion.
